
# Copilot Instructions (hri_rlc)

Follow repository rules in `AGENTS.md`.

## Commit messages

- Keep commit messages short and professional.
- Use a single-line subject in imperative mood.
- Aim for <= 50 characters.
- Do not add a body unless absolutely necessary.

## Code documentation rules

- Python: any new/modified function/method/class must include/update a docstring strictly per `docs/sphinx.md`.
- C++: any new/modified public API/function/method/class must include/update a Doxygen doc strictly per `docs/doxygen.md`.
- CMakeLists: any new/modified `CMakeLists.txt` must follow `docs/CMakeLists.md`.
